alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 6:51PM EDT until July 22 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Pinellas County in west central Florida... Central Hillsborough County in west central Florida... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 650 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Macdill Air Force Base, and will be near Downtown Saint Petersburg, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tampa, St. Petersburg, Pinellas Park, Seminole, Gulfport, Treasure Island, Kenneth City, South Pasadena, Madeira Beach and Bay Pines. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
